short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds some festive cheer to YouTube comments.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your YouTube experience this holiday season by installing our 'YuleTube' browser extension, and turn the troll's comments from naughty into something nice!
